entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33127: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #263
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33170: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #264

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0] [wasm] Chrome DateTimeTests CheckDateTimeLocale failure #88799
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Trailing trivia after GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute included in generated files #88798
  • SslStream now does zero byte read of InnerStream which breaks WCF #88792
  • Tag thread specific information to events #88790
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT EventPipe require a reasonable random number generation to create guids #88789
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT EventPipe require multi byte to wide char support #88785
    8.0.0
  • Timeout in Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTest #88784
    8.0.0
  • File check failures in x64 jit tests #88783
  • PublishAot should respect DebugSymbols/DebugType #88780
  • System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize times out on Mono #88777
  • Virtual Static Method Default Interface Method Reabstraction does not work on Mono #88775
  • Conflict in Property Serialization with System.Text.Json When Hiding Base Interface Properties in Child Interface #88774
  • System.Text.Json.JsonProperty allocated a string in WriteTo() #88767
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #88765
    8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Stop using ThreadlessXunitTestRunner for MT unit tests #88763
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Host should separate arguments for engine, mono and application #88760
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Assertion sgen-gc.c:1251, condition `sgen_gray_object_queue_is_empty (queue)' not met #88757
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Linux_bionic arm64 failure in Convert.cs causing FormatException in System.Diagnostics.Process tests #88756
    7.0.x
  • Write guidance on how to launch (non apphost) apps #88754
  • Optimize HttpRequestOptions storage #88750
    Future
  • Proposal: expose <IlcFoldIdenticalMethodBodies> as a supported option #88748
  • [7.0] [Android] Test failure in X509Certificates.Tests.PfxTests - Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform #88747
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] [tvOSSimulator] Ran out of trampolines of type 1 in System.Private.CoreLib #88746
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Globalization IcuAppLocalTests .TestIcuAppLocal test failure #88742
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Globalization CultureInfoConstructor.Ctor_String failures #88740
    7.0.x
  • Use Python scripts to auto-generate native provider source code #88739
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT library mode on iOS-like platforms #88737
    8.0.0
  • Debugger display of dictionary types and `DebuggerDisplayAttribute.Name` #88736
  • Setting Size on MemoryCacheEntry after insertion causes faulty CurrentEstimatedSize #88733
  • Visual Studio 2022 v17.6.5 can not build dotnet 6.0.20, but v17.6.4 is OK. #88732
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `System.IO.Path` APIs that takes `ReadOnlySpan<char>` instead of `string` as arguments. #88730
  • NativeAOT builds aren't updated when rebuilding with different MSBuild options #88725
  • `JsonIncludeAttribute` should override global `JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties` configuration. #88716
    Future

Closed

  • System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize fails on Mono #88731
    8.0.0
  • Build error 'The following files are missing entries in the templated manifest' #60526
    Future
  • JIT: recursive inline detection using IL code address is not reliable #58824
    Future
  • Regressions in Devirtualization.EqualityComparer #88667
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing with `You must install or update .NET to run this application` #88779
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT `RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations` failing with latest sdk #88752
    8.0.0
  • AccessViolationException in ILLink in .NET 7 #86807
    8.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles floating-point conversions on 64-bit #69795
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support for hardware intrinsics to control treatment of subnormal numbers/denormals #88525
  • `wasm-tools` workload isn't supported on `arm64` version of Docker #75613
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b487364/b487364/b487364.sh #61337
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Design application startup, template, configuration #70892
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `S.R.IS.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes` #77334
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] TE plaintext and json benchmarks regression #61484
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Error on HttpClient.GetAsync for multithread WebAssembly browser app #83790
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests fail #74411
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests fails #74413
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser test fails #74409
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] JSImport and JSExport marshaler infrastructure is not initialized on web worker threads #77287
    8.0.0
  • [interp] inlining a wrapper with a MINT_LDSTR_TOKEN instruction aborts #88694
  • [mono][tests] Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation is failing on iOS platforms #88720
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on method group conversion using extension method #88693
  • Provide workflow to automatically port API docs to dotnet-api-docs #41419
    8.0.0
  • FTP Downloading Randomly Missing Bytes in .NET 6.0 #77232
  • docs/workflow/testing/libraries/testing.md incomplete instructions? #49553
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest #81362
    8.0.0
  • CHECK: expected string not found in input #88622
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator is comparing configuration keys case-sensitively #88112
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] WASM CI failure in Firefox debugger tests #75018
  • [mono] Restore failure due to `The process cannot access the file x because it is being used by another process` #77364
    8.0.0
  • mono Linux x64 Methodical_others error on runtime rolling build #69853
    8.0.0
  • DateTime comparison with different Kind #88729
  • [API Proposal]: Decouple ValidateOnStart from Hosting #84347
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Option to package threaded runtime as CommonJS #76962
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] `Wasm.Browser.Threads.Minimal.Sample` failing on `main` #88668
    8.0.0
  • Deserialization does not fail when a required property is null #88727
  • [browser] Move WasmAppBuilder into transport -> SDK #81367
    8.0.0
  • Enable Finalizer event in NativeAOT #88056
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Deduplicate diagnostics emitted for managed->unmanaged and unmanaged->managed stubs #88803
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [PERF] Explicitly set dotnet root when building tools #88801
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make firing of ETW events in nativeaot opt-in via the enabled/disabled lib #88800
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Feature to be able to selectively deoptimize methods #88797
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [libs][TimeZoneInfo] Add switch for unsorted GetSystemTimeZones #88794
    area-System.DateTime
  • Use macos12 machines in official build #88793
    needs-area-label
  • Get DataContractSerializer to behave nicely with unloadable AssemblyLoadContext #88791
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[interp] Add MINT_STELEM_VT_NOREF (#87161)" #88788
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88787
    area-System.Security
  • Extend the time out for executing the test with RemoteExecutor #88786
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Added BEGIN and END anchors for disasm output #88782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable SxS workload manifests #88781
    area-Workloads
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default #88776
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add System.Net.NameResolution metrics #88773
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure DOTNET_MaxVectorTBitwidth is interpreted as a decimal based input, not hexadecimal #88761
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Extend JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute to have feature parity with JsonSerializerOptions. #88753
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • Check-in changes to generated file #88741
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser][mt] enable more GC code #88735
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove dead code from UnixContext.cpp #88734
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] macOS/iOS: Emit simple compact unwinding information #88724
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [libs][iOS] Disable constant propagation during library build time for System.Linq.Expression.dll #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [mono][tests] Attempt to enable test #88722
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify ldftn reverse lookups #88719
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add set of attributes that can be trimmed on NAOT #88718
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Trim RefSafetyRulesAttribute when trimming aggressively #88717
    linkable-framework
  • ExtendedProtectionPolicy.OSSupportsExtendedProtection: return `false` #88715
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Security
  • Block newly added failing test #88714
    area-System.Collections
  • JSON: Add support for {ReadOnly}Memory<T> #88713
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Ensure Vector256.Dot produces a V256 result #88712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement reabstraction in CoreCLR for Static Virtual Methods #88711
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Support variable page size on Linux Arm64 #88710
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Expanding a marshaller error message #88726
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: fix recursive inline check #88749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Missing defines in GC #88661
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] WBT: Fix breaking tests #88751
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from STACK_PTR to R8 #88745
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix SuperFileCheck from failing outerloop #88692
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [browser] enable JsImportTaskTypes test #88728
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update binding generator to do case-insensitive config-key/property name matching, & make some formatting improvements #88338
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [interp] break up MINT_LDSTR_TOKEN into two opcodes #88738
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add GC.KeepAlive to COM paths in WeakReference #88537
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][threads] save/restore errno in thread state transitions #79856
    area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #88652
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #88653
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move startup validation to the options assembly #88546
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Bumping .net7 and .net6 version #88698
    area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the order of AOT SDK and framework assemblies #88703
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] smoke test active issues #88676
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable finalizer events for EventPipe #88604
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize Vector128<float>/<double>.Equals in interp/jiterp #88064
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Do not use `RhGetCodeTarget` in delegate equality #88611
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #88682
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #88680
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Mark replacements as dirty after setting GTF_VAR_DEATH #88669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing sections in implicit machine.config #88553
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove `DelegateInvokeStubManager` #88683
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default #88486
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reading metadata info after applying changes #88685
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't generate Unmanaged-to-Managed stubs with diagnostics #88679
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2220563 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable new analyzers CA1862, CA1864 in runtime and fix findings. #88700
    area-Meta
  • Add AddHttpClientDefaults #87953
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Enable the option to invoke APICompat in strict mode for ref-pack servicing #88707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add EnumBuilder implementation and other changes #88503
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • HttpClientFactory logging configuration #88706
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #88527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up usings in test cases assembly #88678
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [libs][Unix] Fix UTC alias lookup #88641
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [Mono]: Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Always consider empty remainders to be dying in physical promotion #88665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GitHub_* tests #88640
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Add support for mobile devices in processinfo3 test #88655
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Total time in GC counter #88699
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Simplify KeyAnalyzer #88709
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Allow passing Int128 to p/invokes by reference #88651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Side by side workload manifests with "non standard" semver results in exception string in dotnet --info output #33974
  • File used by another process #33956
  • Unaddressed CVEs detected in SDK Images #33952
  • AD Authentication / Authorization not working anymore in my Blazor Server App since installation of latest version #33941
  • Runtime list file was not found #33936

Closed

  • Should APICompat PackageValidation's EnableStrictModeForCompatibleTfms default to true? #33011
    8.0.1xx
  • GenAPI produces TupleElementNamesAttribute reference in addition to the tuple itself #32458

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33972
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update default TrimMode for WebSDK projects #33962
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Containers: 8.0.1xx readme notes #33945
    Area-Containers
  • VS Shortcut: Use version number file #33938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run: Minor code adjustments #33935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2220399 #33934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Align EnableStrictModeForCompatibleTfms default between frontends #33954
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix feature bands for side-by-side manifests #33937
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #33917
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33926
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update LDM agenda #7333

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense allocates large symbol arrays (LOH) #69004
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync spawns multiple instances of my console app #69001
  • Make ProgrammaticSuppressionInfo public #69000
    17.8
  • [API Proposal]: `ForTypesWithDirectBaseTypeOrInterface` #68999
  • [Feature suggestion]: `ExcludedAnalyzers` MSBuild property to skip running specific analyzers #68998
  • 3.1% allocations of `TypeConversions` #68997
  • Syntax classification taking up to 12% of CPU time #68996

Closed

  • SyntaxGenerator does not support `unmanaged` generic constraint nor `init` properties #68957

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache RetargetingParameterSymbol.TypeWithAnnotations to avoid ~3.5% allocations in a trace #69011
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not consider DOTNET_ROOT when finding dotnet #69010
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Add --opt-cross-module:* to crossgen2.exe command line #69007
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update signature matching rule in interceptors #69006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Simplify core lexing switch #69005
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove Go To Symbol TypeScript service #68987
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move to new OSX queue #69008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use SelectAsArray instead of ArrayBuilder #69003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix lossy error message when lexer encounters certain characters #68919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix `unmanaged` type-parameter generation. And fix `init` accessor generation. #68960
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add Inline Arrays to Compiler Test Plan.md #68980
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Translate `ref readonly` in new synthetic call factory and unskip arglist tests #68951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Address PROTOTYPE comment in interceptors proposal #68986
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • WIP: Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup refactorings around method-flags and body info. #68210
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, 17.8
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Disallow declaring required element fields for an inline array. #68984
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, 17.8
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Implement simple LSP run tests #68889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Misc improvements of OneOrMany #68948
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68966
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Allow client to configure language for resources #68739
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Emit modopt for ref readonly parameters in function pointers #68728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Avoid giving 'no best type' error when one of the types contains error types #68991
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider ConfigureEmptyWebHost along with ConfigureSlimWebHost #49375
  • Exception filters with ordering executing decending. #49372
  • Perf regression: updates, updates #49371
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_ef, single_query #49370
  • Generic Host Building is the complete opposite of clean code #49366
  • Kestrel returns 400 status code when request size is greater than MaxRequestBodySize #49365
  • Blazor Virtualize Component Memory Growth (Leak?) when Scrolling #49364
  • Don't reject ambiguous forms until we try to dispatch the submit event #49362
  • Trimming warning is misleading #49363
  • I want to update User Claims on Change UserName Event and( Renew Access Token + Updated Claim) #49361
  • MVC apps no longer work with PublishTrimmed #49360
  • When form is submitted with no handler, or the handler can't be found, change status to 400/404 #49359
  • IJsRuntime hangs/blocks when using AsyncEventHandler<T> #49358
  • Improve SignalR hubs and client debugging #49354
  • IIS AspNetCore Module V2 returns 10s of 503 error and "Failed to gracefully shutdown applicaiton" warning when recycling a Hello world demo #49350

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #49342
  • Perf regression: endpoint #49352
  • [RDG] Route handlers with the same parameters but differing nullability produce compiler warnings #46622
    8.0-preview7
  • Page title doesn't update in Blazor Web App template #49310
    8.0-preview7
  • With VS2022, an Blazor (.Net 6.0) Server app throws null ref exception at _Host.cshtml if duplicate routing exists by the @page directive. #49357
  • Basic implementation of signalR when hosted on azure failing to connect with negotiation #48800
  • SignalR npm package not able to be bundled using `esbuild` #47674
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #49341
  • Getting routevalues for any url #49290
  • HttpContext.Features.Get<IFormFeature>() returns null unless HttpContext.Request.HasFormContentType is called first #49325

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Move to MacOS 13 #49367
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc
  • update version of identity model libraries #49349
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove TodoGenerator from Api template #49279
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Named events tracking #49298
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Removed redundant <title> tag #49351
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • add null check for User.Identity #49311
    area-identity, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2220150 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    area-hosting
  • Add support for explicit IParsable<T>.TryParse in RDF. #49317
    area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add PointerWheelChanged to PointerGestureRecognizer #16130
  • How to access the font file that location in the Resources folder in the .NET MAUI app. #16129
  • AppThemeBindingExtension not working in code #16126
  • iOS/Catalyst memory leak with CollectionView when CollectionChanged is used #16125
  • `RefreshView` can have a memory leak with a custom `ICommand` #16124
    Backlog
  • SVG Images from my nuget package gets added to the home folder when the nuget is added #16123
  • Downsizing Image with AspectFit leaves space around Image on iOS #16120
  • MenuFlyoutItem with FileImageSource doesn't display icon properly #16119
  • Maui 8 preview 6 Blank app iOS using windows host attached to physyical device cannot find part of MauiInfo.plist #16117
  • Items in CollectionView using GridItemsLayout not sized correctly (content gets clipped) #16115
  • .NET Maui DisplayAlert action button colours do not work properly for multiple themes #16112
  • CollectionView scroll to bottom is not displaying whole cell on iOS #16103
  • GetRenderer and CreateRendererWithContext return NULL value #16102
  • .NET 8.0 Preview 6 - Cant build/start Android project from VS for Mac 15.6.1 or CLI #16099
  • Update Nuget dependencies to latest versions #16098
  • Blank .NET MAUI App crashes on iOS 12 device with .NET 8 preview 6 #16097
    Backlog
  • Add support for WiX Toolset Havest Tool (Heat) HarvestProject element #16096

Closed

  • [NET 8, Windows] wrong initial BindingConext in CollectionView DataTemplate #15212
    .NET 8
  • (Windows) RC1 - RefreshView does not appear when swiping down with mouse #6404
    .NET 8
  • MacCatalyst app launches multiple windows if previous launch had multiple windows open #10939
    .NET 8 GA
  • Azure Pipelines Fails in the Restore Nuget Step on the solution when the solution has a Test project associated with it. #16075
  • .NET 8.0 Preview 5/6 - Unable to edit project properties #16092
  • When I Capture a photo the second time the camera does not open - IOS #15899
  • Shadow.Radius on Android13 [API 33] is broken #10401
    Backlog
  • Memory Leak: MAUI-Windows are not garbage-collected after destroy of MainActivity #15972
    Backlog
  • When I try to compile and run the MAUI project, I get an APT2000 error #16081
    Backlog
  • Android WebViewClient's ShouldInterceptRequest is never called in MAUI WebView #11004
    .NET 8
  • iOS app crashing on device at startup with .NET 8 preview 5 #15673

PullRequests

Created

  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
  • [vs-workload] Set EnableSideBySideManifests=true #16131
  • Update sourcelink, set deterministic builds in CI #16127

  • Add VS Feedback and VS Code links to bug report template list #16121

  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Avoid to use CornerCurve in iOS < 13 #16101
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, high
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️

Merged

  • Revert "[Windows] Allow to refresh the RefreshView using the mouse (#14261)" #16128
  • Null check small refactoring #16086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Revert "Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.2.0" #16122
  • [android] fix memory leak in Window #16045
    memory-leak 💦
  • [housekeeping] Group dependabot PR's by dependency area/type #16111
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested
  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix WinUI test issues #15885
    area/testing
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add seed data support for complex types #31254
  • Add Cosmos support for complex types #31253
  • Add relational JSON mapping support for complex types #31252
  • Add store-generated values support for properties on complex types #31251
  • Add inheritance support for complex types #31250
  • Add pre-convention configuration for complex types #31249
  • Add entity splitting support for complex types #31248
  • Allow service properties on complex types #31247
  • Allow keys and indexes to use properties on non-collection complex types #31246
  • Allow navigations and FK properties on non-collection complex types #31245
  • Enable indexer complex properties #31244
  • Enable shadow complex properties #31243
  • Enable more value object scenarios #31238
  • Complex type collection support #31237
  • Allow to configure properties on non-collection complex types by using chaining in the lambda expression #31236
  • Add CUD sproc mapping support for complex types #31235
    Backlog
  • Implement value conversions that spread out over multiple columns #31234
    Backlog

Closed

  • DateTime.Kind does not trigger entity changed #31240
  • Ambiguous references when scaffolding tables with common names #31204
  • How to use dotnet required keyword and [key] attribute together? #31195
  • Install Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer into project .NET 7 error #31194
  • Efcore 7 max pool size was reached #31118
  • ExecuteUpdate: Duplicate table alias in generated Update query #30856
  • Allow multiple IModelCustomizer #9330
  • Support value conversions from two properties into one column #20582
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add complex type support to migrations #31239
  • More cleanup #31233
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31230
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Use our new JSON serialization infra for partial updates #31232
  • Add `migrations has-pending-model-changes` Command #31164
    waiting-for-response, community-contribution
